model.name: SQLSERVER_DS
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE ITEMS ( ITEM_ID integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ITEM_ID"', NATIVE_TYPE 'int', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ITEM_CODE string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ITEM_CODE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), ITEM_DESCRITION string(255) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"ITEM_DESCRITION"', NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar'), DT_INSERT timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DT_INSERT"', NATIVE_TYPE 'datetime', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DT_UPDATE timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DT_UPDATE"', NATIVE_TYPE 'datetime', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_ITEM_ID PRIMARY KEY(ITEM_ID) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"PK_ITEM_ID"'), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_DT_INSERT INDEX(DT_INSERT), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_DT_UPDATE INDEX(DT_UPDATE), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_ITEM_CODE INDEX(ITEM_CODE), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_ITEM_ID INDEX(ITEM_ID) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"DATAVIRT"."dbo"."ITEMS"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: ITEMS
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW ITEMS ( ITEM_ID integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ITEM_CODE string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), ITEM_DESCRITION string(255) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DT_INSERT timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DT_UPDATE timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE') ) AS SELECT * FROM SQLSERVER_VBL.ITEMS;

model.name: SQLSERVER_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW ITEMS ( ITEM_ID integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'int', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ITEM_CODE string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), ITEM_DESCRITION string(255) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'varchar', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), DT_INSERT timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'datetime', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), DT_UPDATE timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'datetime', UPDATABLE 'FALSE', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT PK_ITEM_ID PRIMARY KEY(ITEM_ID), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_DT_INSERT INDEX(DT_INSERT), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_DT_UPDATE INDEX(DT_UPDATE), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_ITEM_CODE INDEX(ITEM_CODE), CONSTRAINT IX_ITEMS_ITEM_ID INDEX(ITEM_ID) ) AS SELECT * FROM SQLSERVER_DS.ITEMS;
